javadoc: Helper class to manage actions for saving and exporting the tool

methods.name: saveToolAs
methods.comment:
Show the "Save Tool" dialog.  Returns true if the user performed a 'save as'; returns false
 if the user cancelled.

methods.javadoc: Write our tool to a filename; the user is prompted for a filename
methods.name: exportTool
methods.comment: Write our tool to a filename; the user is prompted for a filename

methods.javadoc:
Exports a version of our tool without any config settings.  This is useful for making a
 new 'default' tool to be shared with others, which will not contain any user settings.
methods.name: exportDefaultTool
methods.comment:
Exports a version of our tool without any config settings.  This is useful for making a
 new 'default' tool to be shared with others, which will not contain any user settings.

name: DialogManager
comment: Helper class to manage actions for saving and exporting the tool
